text: Pilosocereus piauhyensis is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil, in the states of Piauí, Ceará, and Rio Grande do Norte. Its natural habitat is rocky areas. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Pilosocereus piauhyensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Pilosocereus piauhyensis
